docs.snippet: To dissipate any impression that the King of Italy or any members of the Italian royal house are selling old furniture, objects of art or antiquities. Consul-General Bernardi of Italy sent out notices yesterday Calling attention ...  to the fact that...
docs.lead_paragraph: To dissipate any impression that the King of Italy or any members of the Italian royal house are selling old furniture, objects of art or antiquities. Consul-General Bernardi of Italy sent out notices yesterday Calling attention ... to the fact that none of the furniture to be sold by the American Art Association this week "ever belonged to the Italian royal house."
docs.abstract: explains sale of Italian antiques by American Art Assn, in reply to Consul General's statement

docs.snippet: European exchanges were quiet and generally lower yesterday. In the early dealings the market exhibited a tendency to get back to the best levels of Tuesday, but increased offerings later brought recessions in most rates. Sterling dropped to $4.34 ...

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Feb. 15 (Associated Press).--Funeral guns boomed in Montevideo today as the body of Sir Ernest Shackleton, the British explorer, was carried aboard the British steamer Woodville, which will take the dead explorer on his last voyage into...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Feb. 15 (Associated Press).--Funeral guns boomed in Montevideo today as the body of Sir Ernest Shackleton, the British explorer, was carried aboard the British steamer Woodville, which will take the dead explorer on his last voyage into Antarctic seas.
docs.abstract: body taken on board ship for conveyance to South Georgia Island

headline.main: SHACKLETON'S BODY LEAVES MONTEVIDEO; Is Taken on Board Ship for Conveyance to South GeorgiaIsland.URUGUAYANS PAY TRIBUTEBritish and Americans Join in Impressive Ceremonies at the DeadExplorer's Funeral.
